text: Ashlee Simpson ’ s Stylist Shares a Trick for Perfect - Fit Jeans Since there seems to be no shortage of impractical and, frankly, unwearable jeans — think : clear knee jeans, thong jeans and bare butt jeans — we thought it was time to seek professional help to navigate 2017 ’ s crazy denim trends.
